inclusion.criterion: Clinical suspicion of acute uncomplicated appendicitis
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: severe migratory pain in the right lower quadrant of his abdomen, nausea and vomiting, febrile with tenderness, rebound tenderness and guarding on palpation, elevated WBC with dominant neutrophils

inclusion.criterion: Clinical suspicion of acute uncomplicated appendicitis based on history, physical examination, laboratory findings evaluated by a senior surgeon
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: severe migratory pain in the right lower quadrant of his abdomen, nausea and vomiting, febrile with tenderness, rebound tenderness and guarding on palpation, elevated WBC with dominant neutrophils

inclusion.criterion: Allergy to contrast material or iodine
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Renal failure, creatinine-value greater than the upper reference value
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Suspicion of peritonitis and appendiceal perforation
inclusion.label: not_met
inclusion.evidence: CT scan showed evidence of acute perforated appendicitis with free fluid in the pelvis

inclusion.criterion: Incapability to cooperate and give consent to participate in the study
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Allergy to contrast material or iodine
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Renal failure, creatinine-value greater than the upper reference value
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Suspicion of peritonitis and appendiceal perforation
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: CT scan showed evidence of acute perforated appendicitis with free fluid in the pelvis

exclusion.criterion: Incapability to cooperate and give consent to participate in the study
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient is a candidate for emergent laparoscopic appendectomy under general anesthesia.
